name: The Emptiness
storyline: You are locked in a space of your doubts and fears. You are wandering about and looking for a way out, but something terrible stands in your way. You strive for light, but darkness doesn’t let you go. You need to pass a series of tests. Open the doors to break out from the dark corners of your soul. Be persistent and courageous and endure to the very end!
summary: Change the perspective of your own psyche. In this game you choose the course of your gameplay and can solve mini-games in many ways! Your experience may be something satanic-like or sweet, innocent and happy. The Emptiness is a tough game and recommended to someone looking for a challenge, who doesn’t mind searching for very well hidden items. Ultimately, The Emptiness offers genuine difficulty, plus a captivating fright factor.
